name: Spaghetti Pie
comments: This is not another way to do spaghetti
ingredients: 1 lb. spaghetti or angel hair pasta
instructions: Heat oven to 350 degrees, then grease a 9x13" pan. Cook spaghetti according to package directions, then drain (do not rinse). Arrange pasta in greased dish.
In small bowl combine eggs and milk. Pour over spaghetti; sprinkle with cheese.
Brown beef in skillet. Drain grease, then stir in spaghetti sauce and heat through. Pour over spaghetti mixture in pan and bake for 45 minutes.
